hero.subtitle: Software Engineer
hero.description: I architect and build high-performance, scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies and robust system design principles.

about.heading: About Me
about.description: I am an experienced Software Engineer with a proven track record in developing robust backend systems and website features for major clients. Known for rapid learning abilities and exceptional teamwork, I excel in fast-paced environments, delivering high-quality software solutions.

item1.title: Software Engineer I (Junior) → Software Engineer III (Mid-level) → Product Architecture
item1.p1: Developed and maintained the IPM Suite application, enhancing core features using <1>{{stack}}</1>, with extensive work on <1>{{database}}</1>.
item1.p2: Led the migration of legacy modules to a <1>{{architecture}}</1> with <1>{{frontend}}</1>, improving system scalability and performance.
item1.p3: Designed, architected, and implemented complex business-critical systems and user interfaces, ensuring high functionality and UX standards.
item1.p4: Active contributor to <1>{{methodology}}</1> ceremonies, improving team practices and leading knowledge transfer sessions.
item1.p5: Conducted research initiatives, introduced new <1>{{tools}}</1> and elevated company-wide coding standards.
item1.p6: Delivered diagnostic queries, data fixes, and support for high-profile clients including <2>{{clients}}</2>, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality.

item2.title: Part-Time Full Stack Developer
item2.p1: Responsible for the maintenance and operational support of several core systems, including <1>{{systems}}</1>. Ensured their stability, performance, and seamless integration within the business workflow.
item2.p2: Worked extensively with <1>{{auth}}</1> to manage user authentication and access control, enhancing system security and efficiency.
item2.p3: These platforms were developed using <1>{{tech}}</1>, and I actively collaborated with development teams to troubleshoot issues, optimize functionality, and support system upgrades.
item2.p4: My role required a strong technical foundation and a proactive approach to system reliability, user support, and continuous improvement across both backend services and user-facing applications.

item3.title: Front-End Developer
item3.p1: Completed a full-scale e-learning platform project, gaining hands-on experience in <1>{{tech}}</1>. Developed <1>{{ui}}</1>, managed state with React hooks, and ensured <1>{{responsive}}</1> across devices.

item4.title: Freelance Developer
item4.p1: Led the end-to-end design and delivery of a scalable AI-driven conversational agent, automating complex workflows and elevating user engagement across multiple platforms.

item1.title: IPM Suite Enhancement
item1.description: Enterprise rights management system with microservices architecture

item2.title: Microservices Migration

cta.heading: Ready to take your digital presence to the next level?
cta.subheading: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
cta.thankyou: Thanks! I'll be in touch soon.

footer.builtWith: Built with {{heart}} and modern web technologies
